transcript.text: Hello everyone! Today is a new video
for Halloween with this Queen of Arachnids
and you can do it with some products you already have
No need to buy anything
If you like it here we go!
I start by covering my brows with a glue stick
I put the glue all over the hairs
it's very important to do all around the hairs
I comb them up and add more glue after
I remove the glue on my skin with some makeup wipes
And I set with some powder
I apply my sclera lenses
I apply my foundation with a beauty blender
I want a full coverage so I add another foundation
I apply my concealer and put some on my brows
I set and then add more concealer
I set all my face with powder
I start my eyes by applying a black pencil on my waterlines
I do my smoky base: on the lid and lower lash line
I use a plum shade from 35P by Morphe
Then I take the black from the same palette to put on top of the crayon
I apply Lash Alert on my lashes
Those lashes come from Illamasqua
I draw my eyes with a beige pencil
and draw the mandibles
I mixed Aqua Black and Aqua Seal to fill all the shapes
that need to be black
I put a white circle around the eyes
I take a brown shade from the same palette
and I add a shadow
I use on the mandibles too
I put some details on the mandibles
With the black in the same palette
I add some contrast
I contrast with a white shadow this time
I use Epic liner from NYX to precise
some details
I use a white flash color to illuminate some things
I use a white liner for the eyes
because it's easier to use there
On my lips I apply Purgatory from BMC
I use the same wig as my Pumpkin look
and it comes from Uniwigs and not Donalovehair
This video is finished I hope you liked it as much as I do
don't hesitate to give it a thumbs up
See you tomorrow for another Halloween tutorial!
